ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: BK.0431: Spain, Lleida, Les Sorts, road from Les Sorts to Coll de Jou; Under loose stones. Alt. 1300m; 42°09'44.4''N 01°23'58.3''E; coll. by hand; 05.viii.2004
